page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: {Greystones First School}has 199 children aged between 5 and 8 years, 8 teachers, 10 classrooms and a hall. On the yard there is a painted hopscotch and a rounders pitch. There are some seats. There is a large shed. There are two drinking taps and a small garden. {Greystones Middle School}has 184 children between 8 and 12 years old, 8 teachers and a headmaster. There is a painted rounders and netball pitch. There is a belltower which was used when it was first built. At lunchtime clubs are held. {Cubs & Scouts.} Boys over 7 years can join Cubs. They meet at church halls to work for badges, play games and do athletics. At the age of 11 boys may join Scouts. This is the same as Cubs but more serious.
